original_text: And there stood before them seventy men of the ancients of the house of Israel, and in the midst of them stood Jaazaniah the son of Shaphan, with every man his censer in his hand; and a thick cloud of incense went up.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속의 장로 중 칠십 명이 그 앞에 섰으며 사반의 아들 야아사냐도 그 가운데에 섰고 각기 손에 향로를 들었는데 향연이 구름 같이 오르더라

sentences.original_text: seventy men of ancients of house of Israel
and in the midst of them stood Jaazaniah
with every man his censer in his hand
and a thick cloud of incense went up
